bibl.title: Egypt Embodied: The Vatican Nile. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Vatican Museum, Museo Chiaramonte, Inv. 2300. - [Introduction.] - Type and taste: the date of the Vatican Nile [in the early second century C.E.]. - Display and audience in the Iseum and Serapeum Campense. - Describing the Nile in the mind's eye: Pygmies and pecheis. - Rivers in dialogue: the Tiber and the Nile. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: SWETNAM-BURLAND Molly, Egypt Embodied: The Vatican Nile. Avec résumé en anglais.

Vatican Museum, Museo Chiaramonte, Inv. 2300. - [Introduction.] - Type and taste: the date of the Vatican Nile [in the early second century C.E.]. - Display and audience in the Iseum and Serapeum Campense. - Describing the Nile in the mind's eye: Pygmies and pecheis. - Rivers in dialogue: the Tiber and the Nile. - Conclusion.
